name: Disastrous Delivery Driver
description:
Pizza Delivery is a boring job, you've got to keep yourself entertained on the road while delivering pizzas on time. 

This new 3D Endless runner features fun and engaging gameplay, with a unique time management mechanic focused around a "Boredom Meter".

Make sure to keep the driver engaged by checking the phone whenever the Boredom Meter is getting low by hitting the Spacebar.

The longer you survive, the more score you get, simple right?
